title: Fault Diagnosis Technology Inquiry Learning Course Utilizing Computer Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational grasp of system principles and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, involving project-based learning linked to real-life contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose various fault types with 80% or higher accuracy using simulation tools
Learners can demonstrate a cognitive schema explaining fault symptoms from a system principle violation perspective in three or more project deliverables
Learners show adaptive problem-solving abilities of 70% or higher when encountering new fault situations through random fault-type exercises (HCI conditions)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
